title: Blessing of God
effectsDescription:
When a friendly unit is attacked,

give it +2/+2.

title: Curse of Undeath
effectsDescription: When a friendly unit is destroyed, summon a 2/2 Skeleton.

title: Desolation Bomb
effectsDescription: When an enemy attacks your hero, deal 2 damage to all enemies.

title: Dreamcatcher
effectsDescription:
When the enemy plays a card,

add two copies of it to your hand.

title: Event Reset
effectsDescription: When the enemy plays an event, return it to hand and increase its cost by 2.

title: First Resort
effectsDescription: When your hero is attacked, summon a 2/1 Older Brother as the new target.

title: Landmine
effectsDescription:
When the opponent plays a unit,

deal 4 damage to it.
